overview: We got a video from some aspiring rock stars that wanted to be in one of our videos. When we showed it to Samantha, she immediately called up a bunch of her girlfriends and invited them over. As party favors she brought over a bunch of horny, naked blindfolded guys (including the four fans) for the girls to choose from. The girls weren't shy about sizing up their potential fuck buddies, and Samantha quickly snatched up two of the fans for herself. After they had fucked her silly, she made sure all of the other girls got off as well. As the guys will tell you, sometimes it's more fun to have the girls on top!
title: Shane's World 27: Girls On Top
